Item: Solve at least 40 challenges as a team across 4–5 main categories
Each member solves at least 8–10 personal challenges in their chosen category
Host 1 internal mini-session per week (one member explains a solved challenge or concept)
Each member picks and specializes in one category (e.g., Web, Crypto, Pwn, Forensics)
Do 2 team mock CTFs (3–5 hours each) using platforms like PicoCTF or CTFtime archives
Ensure every member has a working CTF-ready setup (tools installed, backups ready)
Hold a final strategy meeting  before the event
